Hanford.Hanford Municipal Airport:
Hanford Municipal Airport (ICAO: KHJO, FAA LID: HJO), formerly O18, is a public airport located one mile (1.6 km) southeast of the central business district of Hanford, a city in Kings County, California, United States. It is owned by the City of Hanford.
Although most U.S. airports use the same three-letter location identifier for the FAA and IATA, Hanford Municipal Airport is assigned HJO by the FAA but has no designation from the IATA.


== Facilities and aircraft ==
Hanford Municipal Airport covers an area of 132 acres (53 ha) with one asphalt paved runway (14/32) measuring 75 ft × 5,175 ft (23 m × 1,577 m).
